definition: Cui Jian (1961-), father of Chinese rock music
healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in

sentences.english: Cui Jian is universally acknowledged as the pioneer of the rock-and-roll of Chinese mainland.
sentences.chinese: 崔健被公認爲是中國大陸搖滾樂的先驅。

sentences.english: Cui Jian had a rehearsal to get to.
It's going to be about believing the voice is telling the turth.
sentences.chinese: 我想崔健是唯一一位配的這樣讚譽的中國搖滾先驅。

sentences.english: Even though fewer people are now listening, Cui Jian still rocks.
sentences.chinese: 即使現在很少的人聽搖滾，但是崔健依然搖滾。

sentences.english: Many music critics view Cui Jian as the pioneer of the rock-and-roll in the mainland of China.
sentences.chinese: 很多樂評人把崔健看作是中國大陸搖滾樂的先驅。

definition: Jonathan Lee (1958-), Taiwanese record producer and songwriter
Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor
Eason Chan (1974-), Hong Kong pop singer and actor
Jacky Cheung or Hok Yau Jacky (1961-), Cantopop and film star
Sandy Lam (1966-), Hong Kong pop singer
A-Mei, aka Gulilai Amit (1972-), aboriginal Taiwanese pop singer
Dolan, a people of the Tarim Basin, Xinjiang, also known as 多郎
